title: Wolf's Fire
description: Punch, werewolf pack leader and head of security for Pit of Hades Fetish Club, is guided by purpose, love, and loyalty. It's been that way for centuries. When acquaintances from his past come to town and challenge each of these areas in his life, will Punch be able to control his inner beast? During this Tribulation period, should he even have to?*Since Punch was the most requested character for a book of his own, this one is for fans of The Narcoleptic Vampire Series. Dicey's standard warning regarding sex, violence, and profanity applies.*Released 11-12-13. That has to be special, right???
author: Dicey Grenor
